recipesJson.name: Pearadise
recipesJson.author: Wafflepriest1
recipesJson.description: A tropical eliquid for the summer time. Pear is the main note sitting in a coconut base with pineapple and dragon fruit adding in the tropical notes. Pineapple also makes the vape 'brighter' or juicier, and dragon fruits helps all of the flavors blend together while making the vape a bit sweeter. Great as a shake'n'vape, the pear note is stronger at first and fades just a bit after a few days steep.

reviews.text: Very nice tropical vape, thank you for sharing
Really good recipe, tropical, juicy and enough complexity! After 4 days all these flavors blended together really nicely. Good job!
I have found this recipe to be absolutely addicting!! Kudos wafllepriest1.
Very Clean and bright. Perfect for the summer or whenever you need to get away from bakery type mixes. Simple, not complex...but it works.
